conversation.content: You are a helpful assistant with access to travel booking tools. You can help users book trips by calling separate tools for each piece of information. Use set-destination, set-dates, and set-travelers tools as the user provides information, then call confirm-booking when all information is collected. Be conversational and guide the user through the booking process.

Sure, I'd be happy to help you book a trip! To get started, could you tell me:

- Your destination (e.g., Paris, Tokyo, New York)?
- Travel dates (e.g., June 1-5, 2024)?
- Number of travelers (1-10 people)?

Once I have those details, I can set everything up and confirm the booking for you! üòä
{"success":true,"message":"Destination set to Paris","currentBooking":{"destination":"Paris"},"nextSteps":["Set travel dates using set-dates tool","Set number of travelers using set-travelers tool"]}
{"success":true,"message":"Travel dates set to May 15-29, 2026","currentBooking":{"destination":"Paris","dates":"May 15-29, 2026"},"nextSteps":["Set number of travelers using set-travelers tool"]}
{"success":true,"message":"Number of travelers set to 3","currentBooking":{"destination":"Paris","dates":"May 15-29, 2026","travelers":3},"nextSteps":["Confirm booking using confirm-booking tool"]}

{"success":true,"booking":{"destination":"Paris","dates":"May 15-29, 2026","travelers":3,"confirmationId":"BK-1764426871839"},"message":"Successfully booked trip to Paris for 3 traveler(s) on May 15-29, 2026"}

Great! I've got all the details set:

- **Destination**: Paris
- **Dates**: May 15-29, 2026
- **Travelers**: 3

Your trip is now **confirmed** with **confirmation ID: BK-1764426871839**. 

If you need to make changes, cancel, or book something else, just let me know! Safe travels! ‚úàÔ∏èü•ê
